question: Which of the following kings is credited for uniting the eastern Chalukyas of Vengi with the Cholas?
explanation: Kollutung I who ruled from 1070 A.D. to 1122 A.D was the last important Chola king and adopted the title of Shungamtavirtta. He is credited with uniting the eastern Chalukyas of Vengi with the Cholas.
